cleaned_text: Practical Home Care Medicine A Natural Approach Quick Look Information on traditional remedies and treatments, including herbal teas, tinctures and ointments, for family health. Description This book offers a wealth of remedies and treatments for dealing with common ailments, from traditional herbal teas to tinctures and ointments. Sophia Christine Murphy provides helpful information on their preparation and uses, making this an invaluable guide to family health. Author Sophia Christine Murphy is a specialist in anthroposophical homeopathic medicines and therapies. She was the Director of Weleda USA for many years and founded Lilipoh magazine.
